dialogItems.content:
师父，前面就是火焰山，那铁扇公主的芭蕉扇能扇出千里神风！
Master, ahead lies the Flaming Mountains! Princess Iron Fan's palm-leaf fan can summon winds for a thousand miles!

上次老孙去借扇子，被她一扇子扇到小须弥山，整整飞了五万四千里！
Last time I was blown 54,000 miles to Mount Sumeru with a single swing!

灵吉菩萨的定风珠专克这类法宝，待俺老孙去求来！
Lingji Bodhisattva's Wind-Fixing Pearl counters such magic. I'll go beg for it!

有了此宝，任她扇得天地变色，咱们自可稳步前行！
With this treasure, we'll march forward even if she darkens the sky with wind!

八戒沙僧保护好师父，俺去去就回！
Brothers, guard Master well! I'll be back in a flash!
